name: Cooking Wonder
description:
Explore the kitchen madness world to showcase your cooking skills and make your cooking dreams come true!

Cooking Wonder is a fascinating, casual cook-serve and cooking dash game for craze cooking enthusiasts. There are exciting cooking stories waiting for you to explore. Cook with the season, make delicious food, adopt pet cooking partners, and serve customers to earn coins and accomplish your mission. This food-making game is a good combination of fun, challenges, and cuteness.

Customize your cooking girl with facial expressions, hairstyles, eyes, eyebrows, nose, and lips. You can even change the colors of these parts to fascinate your girl chef. Play well to unlock your favorite pets and boosts. Collect daily rewards and earn maximum coins and gems to solve challenges easily.

The adorable themes with a realistic environment and cute objects keeps you engaged with food-cooking games for hours. Smooth animations and pleasing sound effects make the gameplay even more creative. However, this is one of the best food-making games for girls and cooking lovers. Create your cooking diary now and turn it into a fine cooking magazine now!

Play a unique yummy food cooking game to spice up your interest!

Play the brand new restaurant game for those who are crazy about cooking games, time management games, and makeover games! Experience exciting campus life as a culinary student, kitchen scramble with your competitors, and etch your name on culinary history!
•Fun Cooking Game!
Fun shouldn’t have a limit! Cooking Wonder lets your cooking madness come out in this casual cooking game. Making food games brings a new taste to your gaming life.
Cooking craze game has dozens of levels with different stories for a long-lasting gameplay experience. Every story comes with a different objective to test your skills. Discover captivating stories of your town and complete the theme!
•Interactive Storylines!
As the heroine of a romantic story, you'll be trying to become a chef while looking for your parents. You will have many caring relatives and friends, and spend many happy days with them. But you may also encounter difficulties and betrayals. Can you control your own destiny and get the love you want?
•Dress Up!
Countless different styles of clothing and makeup are included in the game. Gorgeous maxi dresses for movie premieres, gentle outfits for a date, casual sportswear for playing, cool uniforms for cooking competitions. You are the ever-changing model and the most stylish chef!
•Cute Pets!
Come adopt a cute Labrador... they'll even help you beat levels! An American Shorthair cat, Siamese cat, Pomeranian, Doberman, and many more cute animals are waiting for you!
•Decorating!
Dress yourself up! Live your stylish life by trying on ultra-chic looks and showing them to the world! Decorate a unique house with various items according to your own taste!
•Amusement Park!
Play exciting cooking challenges like ""Roller Coaster Delivery"" and ""Grumpy Bumper Cars"". Compete in weekly events for the best scores! Join the global rankings!
•Enjoy With Friends!
Games are always more fun with friends. Enjoy the wonderful world of cooking with your friends and guild team. Explore and complete stories together. Cheers! !
GAME FEATURES:
√High-resolution and colorful graphics
√Mesmerizing theme of the cooking world
√Interactive and fantastic stories
√Variety of character customization options and outfits
√Introduce cute pets and unlock boosts
√750+ levels with exciting storylines
√350+ decoration tasks and furniture
√Character customizations options
√Lots of Free Prize Opportunities
√Join your friends in guild challenges

Note: Players can purchase coins and gems with exclusive deals to make their gameplay even more exciting.

If you have any questions or suggestions about Cooking Wonder, please contact us at support@wonderlegend.com.
